Name: Inspect CSS at-rule
Description: Can I inspect the @property CSS at-rules applied to an element?

Notes: 1. To inspect your registered custom properties, in **Elements > Styles**, hover over the property name and see its descriptors in a tooltip. In the tooltip, click the link to view the registered property in the collapsible @property section.
References: 1. "New section for custom properties in Elements > Styles", [What's new in DevTools 118](https://developer.chrome.com/blog/new-in-devtools-118/#css).
